Articles.Content:
For those of you interested in more than just fanworks, Radion is running a roleplay on an offsite server here:

http://kerbalroleplay.com/

Edited May 23, 2014 by Rowsdower

Yes, roleplay is back with a new look, forum, and set of rules. If you are not experienced, don't worry, we have our team of Headmasters ready to help you out and teach you how to roleplay. We also have a set of tutorials for you to read that can guide you towards creating a new nation or corporation. Creativity is key there, and if you need any help, please feel free to ask.

If you have any problems with the site itself, please visit the "Contact Support" page for information on how to contact the Site Administrator (that is, me).

In-Roleplay Probelms should be directed to either one of us, Ascensiam and I, if it is extremely urgent, and for less urgent problems feel free to contact any Grandmaster/Gamemaster.

Thank you, and welcome to the KSP Roleplay Forums.
